parts.title: Listening Part 1
parts.content: Listen to a conversation about arranging a meeting and answer the questions.

parts.title: Listening Part 2
parts.content: Listen to a monologue about student accommodation and answer the questions.

parts.title: Reading Part 1
parts.content: Read the text about park history and answer the questions.

parts.title: Reading Part 2
parts.content: Read the text about work-life balance and answer the questions.

parts.title: Writing Task 1
parts.content: Write a report on the given graph.

parts.title: Writing Task 2
parts.content: Write an essay discussing the advantages and disadvantages of studying abroad.
